result.title: Total unit design ready for manufacturing
result.description: Design a first-of-a-kind commercial system suitable for serial production. Besides the technical specifications, business requirements to gain market value must be met. The business requirements will be defined upon start of the task and will include unit cost below 50 kEUR and maintenance schedule below 3 months. When the first of a kind commercial system has been proven, the actual system will be designed based on the learnings from the first generation
